mapper.select: select assessment_code, assessment_name from assessment order by assessment_code
select rnp_code, rnp_name from rnp order by rnp_code
select site_code, site_name from site order by site_code

select ew.employee_code, e.employee_name, d.department_name, s.site_name from employee e, employee_work ew, department d, site s where e.employee_code = ew.employee_code and ew.department_code = d.department_code and d.site_code = s.site_code order by ew.employee_code
